name: Solar System (itch) (Pibu)
description:
A small little preview of a "tutorial" from a Game Development Course I'm taking to understanding the basics of not only Unity but elements such as 'Prefab', 'baked lighting',  'Scenes', and 'Assets' to name a few. This little project is considered an assignment in the course to start my Game Development career. It may not be the best but I'll get there in the future!

Credits:

Created by Pibu

Scripting by Brian Winn (The teacher for my course!)
